timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-12T11:34:22", "sender_email": "manachanok7@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Manachanok, Secure Your BIMM Student Accommodation Today!", "message": "Hello Rishabh,\\n\\nI apologize for the delayed response and for missing your call. I saw that there were rooms available, but after I started filling out the booking form, they all became unavailable. This is why I was unable to complete the booking.\\n\\nCould you please advise me on what to do if the Ensuite 3-4 Bed Apartment option isn't available when I'm trying to book? Additionally, the start and end dates for the contract don't align with my schedule. {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-12T12:00:36", "sender_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "manachanok7@gmail.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Manachanok, Secure Your BIMM Student Accommodation Today!", "message": "Hello Manachanok,\\n\\nThank you for your prompt response and for sharing your concerns. I understand the frustration of seeing rooms become unavailable during the booking process, and I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.\\n\\nRegarding the Ensuite 3-4 Bed Apartment options, these specific room types tend to be in high demand and can be booked very quickly. However, I have an excellent alternative that I believe would be a great fit for you.\\n\\nFor the upcoming Academic Year 2025/2026, I recommend the Classic Studio on Floors 4-7. This option offers a 51-week contract, from September 6, 2025, to August 28, 2026, totaling 357 days. The rent is \u00a3343.00 per person per week, amounting to \u00a317,493.00 for the entire contract. This includes essential bills such as Gas, Electricity, Water, Internet, and Contents Insurance.\\n\\nFurthermore, if you book today, you can avail a discount of \u00a3300. They also accept international guarantors for installments, which offers greater payment flexibility.\\n\\nI would be happy to discuss this option further with you and address any other questions you may have.
